responses: Hello, thanks for asking

I can help you by consoling and providing you with a proper help. I can guide you to a professional therapist and give you suggestions to help you for time being.

patterns: I have a short attention span
responses: Heyyyy..... so you might be exhausted a bit from your current schedule or sudden influx of work you should prolly consider taking a break , go out with your friends have some time to yourself and balance your mental health and work. If you want to have a calming session you can listen to this playlist and feel relaxed - https://open.spotify.com/playlist/37i9dQZF1DX2TRYkJECvfC?si=752b6f04fd8f4af5 .

patterns: I feel tired and restless at the same time
I have a short attention span
responses: Heyyyy..... everything is going to be fine, even though things don't seem to be right at the moment they are gonna be alright , let time work it's ways out. You can always talk to your family, friends or closed ones. If not anyone you can consult a therapist and visit for an appointment in person or virtually on - https://www.cult.fit/mind/therapy .Just so as you feel better for now I'll suggest you a game which helps battling clinical depression and various other problems - https://store.steampowered.com/app/825240/Elude/ it's called Elude. You can also listen to this playlist - https://open.spotify.com/playlist/37i9dQZF1DWU13kKnk03AP?si=a9156f30869843e7 . Everything is gonna be great don't you worry........See you soon Bye! :)

patterns: I am distressed about my future
responses: Heyyyy..... you can take a break from thinking too much or letting your thoughts run very beserk and stressing you out, even though rational thinking is fine overthinking isn't. You should calm down a bit sometimes and give your thought processes some rest. If you are not able to control it you can always talk to your family, friends or closed ones. You can consult a therapist and visit for an appointment in person or virtually on - https://www.cult.fit/mind/therapy .Just so as you feel better for now I'll suggest you a game which helps battling anxiety and various other problems - https://store.steampowered.com/app/825240/Elude/ it's called Elude. You can also listen to this playlist - https://open.spotify.com/playlist/37i9dQZF1DWU13kKnk03AP?si=a9156f30869843e7 . Everything is gonna be great don't you worry........ See you soon Bye! :)

patterns: I don't feel like going out
Nothing seems to feel like before
responses: Heyyyy..... I know you have gone through a traumatizing event in the past but you have battled through it, look at you a strong, bold survivor. It's okay to feel discomfort or trauma around things that bring out the bad memories.....we can and will work on it, but if you are very scared  you can always talk to your family, friends or closed ones. If not anyone you can consult a therapist and visit for an appointment in person or virtually at - https://www.cult.fit/mind/therapy .Just so as you feel bettter you can also listen to this playlist - https://open.spotify.com/playlist/37i9dQZF1DX3TRdW1ekdvM?si=eb0d52914a9440a6 . Everything is gonna be great don't you worry........See you soon Bye! :)

patterns: I don't feel my brain functioning at higher capacity
responses: Heyyyy..... sleeping is an integral part of our routine and for whatever reason you are not able to sleep, we can counter this issue. Sleep deprevation can have serious health issues so I suggest you visit a doctor as soon as possible or you can consult a doctor's appointment virtually - https://nithra.com/ .You can also listen to this playlist - https://open.spotify.com/playlist/37i9dQZF1DX3TRdW1ekdvM?si=9a0ab92e575442cb .

patterns: I do a lot of uneccessary arranging
I can't control my cleaning habbits
I tire myself out cleaning things
I have no control over my obssesions
I feel people are distancing from me
I can't let things be the way they are
responses: Heyyyy..... cleaning and maintaining hygine is an important part of one's life, but just like anything else, one thing in too much amount can cause trouble. Being overly compulsive about stuff can drive people away from you which isn't a good thing. You can consult a therapist and visit for an appointment in person or virtually at - https://www.cult.fit/mind/therapy .You can also listen to this playlist - https://open.spotify.com/playlist/37i9dQZF1DX3rxVfibe1L0?si=e7822ab263354c6f . Everything is gonna be great don't you worry........ See you soon Bye! :)

patterns: So do you think I have OCD?
You think I prolly might have OCD?
Am I an OCD person then
What do you think I might have?
responses: Yes so you probably might have OCD.....as I said above you can follow the link and get a sureity on that topic by consulting to a professional.

patterns: Is it bad to have OCD?
Will having OCD affect my normal day to day things?
responses: There is no need to be distressed......calm down it's very normal to have it and it is curable so don't you worry even a bit.

patterns: I don't understand how can I have this mental illness?
responses: Hey hey hey..... please take a deep breath and feel calm. It's very okay to have such ailments, it's about how you treat them and how you want to handle them that helps you out. Don't worry much, with therapy sessions and good company everything gets sorted. If you might as well follow this link to get yourself booked for counselling/therapy - https://www.cult.fit/mind/therapy

patterns: Will I ever get out of this?
responses: Yesss you will you don't know the strength that you yourself hold. Everything will change n be great just have faith. You can ask for affirmations from me to feel positive and empowered if you wish to.

These are certain affirmations that will surely help you out to empower yourself throughout the day keep reading them repeatedly:    I am successful. I am confident. I am powerful. I am strong. I am getting better and better every day. All I need is within me right now. I wake up motivated. I am an unstoppable force of nature. I am a living, breathing example of motivation. I am living with abundance. I am having a positive and inspiring impact on the people I come into contact with. I am inspiring people through my work. I am rising above the thoughts that are trying to make me angry or afraid.

patterns: I want information on mental heath
how can i understand mental ailments
responses: Hi, Knowing about depression and mental ailments is a very important thing especially to diagnose if you or any of your loved one is facing some issue or is mentally not doing so well. Kindly visit this website for info on mental health - https://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/mental-illness/symptoms-causes/syc-20374968
